title: Our Services
description: We provide complete engineering, design & build, full support for any size project from concept designs up to project completion and commissioning.

items.title: Electrical Engineering Services
items.text: This includes installation, testing, and commissioning of electrical systems, preventive and predictive maintenance on electrical power installations, and automation involving control systems, PLCs, sensors and actuators, HMI, and embedded systems.

items.title: Civil Engineering Services
items.text: This encompasses design, construction, infrastructure development, environmental engineering, project management, and maintenance and rehabilitation.
